page.title: 19LIFE STYLES PAISLEY
page.content: The music people in our school like varies from{Heavy Metal}to{Pop.}The most popular artist among the girls is Nik Kershaw and among the boys the group Madness.The Madness fans in our school are usually the disruptive pupils. Heavy Metal fans wear blue jeans denim and leather jackets with back patches with rotting faces and the group's name. Their tee-shirts usually have the same design.They wear belts with metal studs,and baseball boots.They wear their hair long. The girls who like Nik Kershaw,Wham and King dress like their stars and copy the hairstyles of their stars.They often wear hats, scarves, badges and tee-shirts with the artists' names and pictures on them. Madness fans wear Pork Pie Hats, Pin Stripe Trousers and "Bomber"Jackets.
